name: SHAM 1
description: Adaptation for H=N of page 2 and 3 of "SHAM" (www.livropangeia.com.br/sham). Second mint of a gif series based on the publication. "SHAM" is part of the project "PANGEIA - fragments of syrian war in Brazil" (www.livropangeia.com.br); a brazilian book reporting on the war in Syria, its refugees and political/humanitarian issues surrounding the conflicts. 800 x 800, GIF.
